name: Vanillite
description: The temperature of their breath is -58° F. They create snow crystals and make snow fall in the areas around them.

abilities.name: Ice Body
abilities.effect: This Pokémon heals for 1/16 of its maximum HP after each turn during hail, and it does not take hail damage regardless of type.
abilities.description: The Pokémon regains HP in a hailstorm.

abilities.name: Snow Cloak
abilities.effect: During hail, this Pokémon has 1.25× its evasion, and it does not take hail damage regardless of type.  The evasion bonus does not count as a stat modifier.  Overworld: If the lead Pokémon has this ability, the wild encounter rate is halved in snow.

abilities.name: Weak Armor
abilities.effect: Whenever a physical move hits this Pokémon, its Speed rises one stage and its Defense falls one stage.  This ability triggers on every hit of a multiple-hit move.
abilities.description: Physical attacks lower Defense and raise Speed.
